titleStmt.title: A relation of the horrid injuries committed by the King of Sweden, upon the Duke of Curland his dutches, and seven children. Together with the Dukes vindication from the Swedish calumnies.
Defensio Principis Curlandiæ Suecorum calumnis opposita.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Simon Miller at the Star in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: First published in 1658 as: Defensio Principis Curlandiæ Suecorum calumniis opposita. Or, A vindication of the Duke of Curland against the Swedish calumnies.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
